# identifier

**Instance Property**

The name of the joint.

## Declaration

```swift
let identifier: String
```

## Inspecting a joint

- **localPosition**: The joint position relative to the parent joint.
- **position**: The joint position relative to the camera.
- **parentJoint**: The parent joint in the observation.

items.description: The joint position relative to the parent joint.
